writer.name: 索尼娅·安德森 Sonia Anderson

director.name: 索尼娅·安德森 Sonia Anderson

this_title: Battle of Dunkirk: From Disaster to Triumph
trans_title: 敦刻尔克之战：扭转败局
introduction: Relive the bravery of the Dunkirk veterans in defenseless boats crossing the English Channel to rescue the stranded soldiers from the inferno through their uplifting stories of heroism in a battle that changed the course of WWII.
chinese_title: 敦刻尔克之战：扭转败局
foreign_title: Battle of Dunkirk: From Disaster to Triumph
